mapper.select: select it.id, it.item, it.content, it.language from t_item_title it where it.item = #{item}
mapper.insert: insert into t_item_title( id, content, item, language )value( #{id}, #{content}, #{item}, #{language} )
mapper.select: select it.id, it.item, it.content, it.language from t_item_title it where it.item = #{item} and it.language = #{language}

#{lang.id}

select distinct * from t_item_title where language="ff808181257c178801257c186ab80003" and item in (select distinct i.id from t_item i, ( SELECT MIN(it.item) as item FROM t_item_title it where it.language = "ff808181257c178801257c186ab80003" and it.content like '%${querystr}%' GROUP BY it.content) title where i.id = title.item and title.item not in ( select taskitem.item_id from t_task_item taskitem where taskitem.task_id = #{taskId} ))

select * from t_item_title a where a.language="ff808181257c178801257c186ab80003" AND a.item IN (select t.id from t_item t where t.id IN (select item_id from t_task_item t where t.task_id = #{taskId}))

select * from t_item_title as titletable, (select id as itemid,item_lat,item_lng,author_id,usertable.nickname,create_time as createTime from t_item as itemtable, (select id as auth_id,nickname from t_users where user_level >=2) as usertable where itemtable.author_id = usertable.auth_id ORDER BY usertable.nickname ASC) as itemnicktable where itemnicktable.itemid = titletable.item and titletable.language = "ff808181257c178801257c186ab80002" group by content
